snippet.title: Train Chase - Trailer
snippet.description:
Coming to Steam, Oculus, Viveport and Itch.io.

You escaped on a train, but the evil corporation is still chasing you. Defeat waves of enemies in a low-poly environment on a train with several of different weapons.

Train Chase is a Wave Shooter optimized for VR, but playable with PC Hardware or Gamepad too.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/477120/Train_Chase/

https://rhinegames.com​/
https://discord.gg/uhVZhaRXkN
https://twitter.com/rhinegames
https://www.facebook.com/RhineGames
